effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Damage calculation ignores the target’s stat modifiers, including evasion.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.
